adHeader: Cheap Distressed Houses in San Mateo County
adDetails: Hey, if you're a local real estate investor and are looking for deeply discounted properties, we would love the opportunity to connect with you. We've discovered a way to secure an endless supply of houses at pennies on the dollar in San Mateo County, and would love to pass these deals along to you. If you'd like to save countless hours and thousands in marketing costs, join our VIP Buyer's List at www.sanjoserealestatebargains.com or Just reply with your best contact information...and we look forward to talking soon. Thanks. Perry Fernandez
